data: CARD Rapid ASA Desensitization Protocol (90 Minute Desensitization)
Initiate this PowerPlan when patient is ready to receive the first dose of ASA for this protocol
RN to ensure patient receives ASA desensitization discharge letter
Do not use this protocol if:  - Reported anaphylaxis  - Stevens-Johnson syndrome  - Toxic epidermal necrolysis  - Any severe allergic reaction to ASA
